thread.title: Brands urged to intervene in strike talks at Uniqlo supplier
thread.title_full: Brands urged to intervene in strike talks at Uniqlo supplier

title: Brands urged to intervene in strike talks at Uniqlo supplier
text: Brands urged to intervene in strike talks at Uniqlo supplier By Michelle Russell | 14 July 2015 Font size Email Print A group of unions and human rights organisations have called on clients of the Shenzhen Artigas garment factory - subject to prolonged strike action over a relocation decision - to intervene in negotiations with workers over severance pay.
